item.text: While Peter and John were speaking to the people, the priests and the commander of the temple guard and the Sadducees came up to them,

<st data-num="1278">angry</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1223">because</st> <st data-num="846" class="">they</st> were <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2605" class="">announcing</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> the <st data-num="386">resurrection</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="1911 5495">seized</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> them <st data-num="1519" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5084" class="">jail</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="839" class="">next day</st> (<st data-num="1063">for</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="2073">evening</st>).
But many of those who had listened to the message believed, and the number of the men came to about 5,000.
On the next day, their rulers, elders, and experts in the law came together in Jerusalem.

<st data-num="452" class="">Annas</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> was there, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2533" class="">Caiaphas</st>, <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, <st data-num="223" class="">Alexander</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">others</st> who <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> members <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="748">high priest’s</st> <st data-num="1085" class="">family</st>.<n id="1" />

After<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2476" class="">making</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Peter and John</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> their <st data-num="3319" class="">midst</st>, they began to <st data-num="4441" class="">inquire</st>, “<st data-num="1722" class="">By</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4169" class="">what</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="3" /> did <st data-num="4771">you</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>?”

<st data-num="5119" class="">Then</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, <st data-num="4130" class="">filled</st> with the <st data-num="40" class="">Holy</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="758">Rulers</st> of the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4245" class="">elders</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1487" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> are being <st data-num="350" class="">examined</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="2108" class="">good deed</st><n id="3" /> done to a <st data-num="772" class="">sick</st> <st data-num="444">man</st>—<st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> means <st data-num="3778">this man</st> was <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st><n id="4" />—

let it <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="1110" class="">known</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3480" class="">Nazarene</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4717" class="">crucified</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, <st data-num="3778">this man</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">stands</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5199" class="">healthy</st>.
This Jesus is the stone that was rejected by you, the builders, that has become the cornerstone.
And there is salvation in no one else, for there is no other name under heaven given among people by which we must be saved.”
When they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and discovered that they were uneducated and ordinary men, they were amazed and recognized these men had been with Jesus.

<st data-num="5037" class="">And</st> because they <st data-num="991" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> who had been <st data-num="2323" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, they <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> to say <st data-num="471" class="">against</st> this.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when they had <st data-num="2753" class="">ordered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="4892" class="">council</st>,<n id="1" /> they began to <st data-num="4820" class="">confer</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">with</st> <st data-num="240" class="">one another</st>,

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="5101">What</st> should we <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> with <st data-num="3778" class="">these</st> <st data-num="444" class="">men</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it is <st data-num="5318" class="">plain</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="2730" class="">live</st> in <st data-num="2419" class="">Jerusalem</st> that a <st data-num="1110">notable</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous sign</st><n id="2" /> has <st data-num="1096">come about</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="720" class="">deny</st> it.

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="3361">keep</st> this matter <st data-num="3361">from</st> <st data-num="1268" class="">spreading</st> <st data-num="1909 4183">any further</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, let us <st data-num="546" class="">warn</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="3367">no more</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="444" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they <st data-num="2564" class="">called</st> them in and <st data-num="3853" class="">ordered</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="5350" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="3366" class="">or</st> <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st> <st data-num="2527">at all</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="2424">Jesus</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1487">Whether</st> it <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">right</st> <st data-num="1799" class="">before</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> to <st data-num="191" class="">obey</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">rather</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">than</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, you <st data-num="2919" class="">decide</st>,

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> it is <st data-num="3756 1410">impossible</st><n id="1" /> for <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> about <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> we have <st data-num="1492">seen</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st>.”

After <st data-num="4324" class="">threatening</st> them <st data-num="4324" class="">further</st>, they <st data-num="630" class="">released</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, for they could <st data-num="3367" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> to <st data-num="2849" class="">punish</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1223">on account of</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st>, <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> they were <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">praising</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">for</st> what had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st>.
For the man, on whom this miraculous sign of healing had been performed, was over forty years old.
When they were released, Peter and John went to their fellow believers and reported everything the high priests and the elders had said to them.

When they <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this, they <st data-num="142" class="">raised</st> their <st data-num="5456" class="">voices</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3661">with one mind</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="1203">Master</st> of all,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> who <st data-num="4160" class="">made</st> the <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>, the <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st>,<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> that is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>,

who said by the Holy Spirit through your servant David our forefather,

‘Why do the nations rage,

and the peoples plot foolish things?

The kings of the earth stood together,

and the rulers assembled together,

against the Lord and against his Christ.’
“For indeed both Herod and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles and the people of Israel, assembled together in this city against your holy servant Jesus, whom you anointed,

to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3745">as much as</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">power</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1012" class="">plan</st><n id="2" /> had <st data-num="4309">decided beforehand</st><n id="3" /> would <st data-num="1096" class="">happen</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st>, <st data-num="1896">pay attention</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">to</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="547" class="">threats</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1325" class="">grant</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">servants</st><n id="3" /> to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">great</st> <st data-num="3954" class="">courage</st>,<n id="5" />

while <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1614" class="">extend</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2392" class="">heal</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">bring about</st> <st data-num="4592">miraculous signs</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5059" class="">wonders</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="3816" class="">servant</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.”
When they had prayed, the place where they were assembled together was shaken, and they were all filled with the Holy Spirit and began to speak the word of God courageously.
The group of those who believed were of one heart and mind, and no one said that any of his possessions was his own, but everything was held in common.

With<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> were <st data-num="591" class="">giving</st> <st data-num="3142" class="">testimony</st><n id="2" /> to the <st data-num="386" class="">resurrection</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="5037" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="3761">no</st> <st data-num="5100">one</st> <st data-num="1729" class="">needy</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="3745">those</st> who <st data-num="5225" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2935" class="">owners</st> of <st data-num="5564" class="">land</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">houses</st> <st data-num="5225" class="">were</st> <st data-num="4453" class="">selling</st><n id="2" /> them<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="5342" class="">bringing</st> the <st data-num="5092" class="">proceeds</st> from the <st data-num="4097" class="">sales</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">placing</st> them <st data-num="3844" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles’</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>. The proceeds<n id="1" /> were <st data-num="1239" class="">distributed</st> to <st data-num="1538" class="">each</st>, <st data-num="2530">as</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st> <st data-num="2501" class="">Joseph</st>, a <st data-num="3019" class="">Levite</st> who was a <st data-num="1085" class="">native</st> of <st data-num="2953" class="">Cyprus</st>, <st data-num="1941" class="">called</st> <st data-num="575" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="652" class="">apostles</st> <st data-num="921" class="">Barnabas</st> (<st data-num="3739">which</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3177" class="">translated</st> “<st data-num="5207">son</st> of <st data-num="3874">encouragement</st>”),<n id="1" />
sold a field that belonged to him and brought the money and placed it at the apostles’ feet.
